titleStmt.title: An essay to promote virtue by example in a collection of excellent sayings (divine and moral) of devout & learned men, in all ages, from the apostles time, to this present year, 1689 / By William Whitcombe, gent.
titleStmt.author: Whitcombe, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author: and are to be sold by Edw. Evets ...,
